overview: Coveted by every manager in world football and idolised by Liverpool and England fans, Steven Gerrard truly has the world at his feet. This programme provides fans with a rare and unique insight into the world of a footballing legend. It includes an in-depth interview with Steve talking about all aspects of his life, all the best moments and goals from his Liverpool and England career, a personal tour of his old haunts as a child, and exclusive comments from both former Anfield and England legends and other distinguished football fans.
title: Steven Gerrard: My Story
